content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":114161,"originalJapaneseLine":"　かちゃかちゃかちゃー♪","translatedEnglishLine":"*Clatter clatter clatter~♪"},{"lineNumber":114162,"originalJapaneseLine":"「生クリームは入ってないよ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There's no fresh cream in it, you know?\""},{"lineNumber":114163,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んふふ、クッキー作るの久しぶりー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, it's been a while since I made cookies.\""},{"lineNumber":114164,"originalJapaneseLine":"「昔はよく作ってたの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Did you make them often before?\""},{"lineNumber":114165,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、学校に行ってた頃は、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, when I was going to school,"},{"lineNumber":114166,"originalJapaneseLine":"　家庭科の授業で作ったり……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I used to make them in home economics class...\""},{"lineNumber":114167,"originalJapaneseLine":"「またクッキーが作れるなんて思わなかった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I never thought I'd be able to make cookies again.\""},{"lineNumber":114168,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ？　どうして？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Why is that?\""},{"lineNumber":114169,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、私、魔王だから……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, because I'm a Demon Lord...\""},{"lineNumber":114170,"originalJapaneseLine":"「普通の女の子らしいこと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I thought I probably couldn't do normal girly things"},{"lineNumber":114171,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう出来ないのかなって思ってたから」","translatedEnglishLine":"anymore.\""},{"lineNumber":114172,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うぅん、そんなことないよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, that's not true.\""},{"lineNumber":114173,"originalJapaneseLine":"「絶対にそんなことない」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Absolutely not.\""},{"lineNumber":114174,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":114175,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルらしからぬ力強い言葉に、","translatedEnglishLine":"Taken aback by the strong words uncharacteristic of Seale,"},{"lineNumber":114176,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹は少し呆気に取られ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki was a little dumbfounded,"},{"lineNumber":114177,"originalJapaneseLine":"すぐに笑みを浮かべた。","translatedEnglishLine":"but quickly smiled."},{"lineNumber":114178,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えへへー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehehe~...\""},{"lineNumber":114179,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シィルおねぇちゃーん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Seale onee-chan...\""},{"lineNumber":114180,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹はシィルに後ろから抱きついて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki hugged Seale from behind,"},{"lineNumber":114181,"originalJapaneseLine":"スリスリと頬ずりしだした。","translatedEnglishLine":"and started rubbing her cheek against hers."},{"lineNumber":114182,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ごろごろ、ごろごろ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Purr, purr...\""},{"lineNumber":114183,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くすっ、美樹ちゃんたら……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, Miki-chan... you're such a spoiled one today.\""},{"lineNumber":114184,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日は随分と甘えたさんなのね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're really acting quite affectionate today.\""},{"lineNumber":114185,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ、次は生地を冷やして……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, next we chill the dough... "},{"lineNumber":114186,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その間お茶でも飲みましょうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"In the meantime, shall we have some tea?\""},{"lineNumber":114187,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はーい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Okay!\""},{"lineNumber":114188,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランスくーん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rance-kun!\""},{"lineNumber":114189,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おや、美樹ちゃん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, Miki-chan?\""},{"lineNumber":114190,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃじゃーん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ta-da!\""},{"lineNumber":114191,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、これは……ケーキ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, what's this... cake?\""},{"lineNumber":114192,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほら、前にランスくん言ってたでしょ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You see, Rance-kun said before, right?"},{"lineNumber":114193,"originalJapaneseLine":"　久しぶりに私のクッキーが食べたいって」","translatedEnglishLine":"He said he wanted to eat my cookies again after a long time.\""},{"lineNumber":114194,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ？　そんなこと言ったか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Did I say that?\""},{"lineNumber":114195,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、だって言ってたよ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, but you did say that, didn't you?"},{"lineNumber":114196,"originalJapaneseLine":"　スルメ山で……","translatedEnglishLine":"At Surume Mountain..."},{"lineNumber":114197,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスくんが襲って来るちょっと前に……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just a little before Rance-kun attacked...\""},{"lineNumber":114198,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あれ？　ランスくんが二人……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, huh? There are two Rance-kuns...\""},{"lineNumber":114199,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーっ、言った言った！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah! You did say that!\""},{"lineNumber":114200,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うむ、そんなこともあったなー！","translatedEnglishLine":"Yeah, that did happen!\""},{"lineNumber":114201,"originalJapaneseLine":"　わーい、嬉しいぞー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yay, I'm so happy!\""},{"lineNumber":114202,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、うん、良かった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, yeah, good.\""},{"lineNumber":114203,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えへへ、たくさん食べてね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehehe, eat lots, okay?\""},{"lineNumber":114204,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おうおう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh yeah, oh yeah.\""},{"lineNumber":114205,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おー、サクサク、ウマイウマイ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, crunchy, tasty tasty!\""},{"lineNumber":114206,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そっかー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see...\""},{"lineNumber":114207,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、よかった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, that's good.\""},{"lineNumber":114208,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランスくん、私って……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rance-kun, I am...\""},{"lineNumber":114209,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスくんの彼女、だよね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Your girlfriend, right?\""},{"lineNumber":114210,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おう、もちろんじゃないか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yeah, of course.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かちゃかちゃかちゃー♪
「生クリームは入ってないよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There's no fresh cream in it, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んふふ、クッキー作るの久しぶりー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, it's been a while since I made cookies."
"Yeah, when I was going to school,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 家庭科の授業で作ったり……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I used to make them in home economics class..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「またクッキーが作れるなんて思わなかった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I never thought I'd be able to make cookies again."
"I thought I probably couldn't do normal girly things

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう出来ないのかなって思ってたから」
シィルらしからぬ力強い言葉に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Taken aback by the strong words uncharacteristic of Seale,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹は少し呆気に取られ、
すぐに笑みを浮かべた。
美樹はシィルに後ろから抱きついて、
スリスリと頬ずりしだした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and started rubbing her cheek against hers.
"Hehe, Miki-chan... you're such a spoiled one today."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日は随分と甘えたさんなのね」
その間お茶でも飲みましょうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the meantime, shall we have some tea?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほら、前にランスくん言ってたでしょ？
久しぶりに私のクッキーが食べたいって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He said he wanted to eat my cookies again after a long time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へ？　そんなこと言ったか？」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh, but you did say that, didn't you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスくんが襲って来るちょっと前に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just a little before Rance-kun attacked..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あれ？　ランスくんが二人……」
うむ、そんなこともあったなー！
「おー、サクサク、ウマイウマイ」
ランスくんの彼女、だよね？」
「お、おう、もちろんじゃないか」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There's no fresh cream in it, you know?"
